alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 9:17PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM TUESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers and strong winds continuing overnight. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains above 5000 feet. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel on icy, snow covered roads will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow level will fall to around 5000 feet early this evening and to 4000 feet on Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
